chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Water drops from your eye are tears.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and " bristle ", the original meaning is tears. "The Jade Chapter‧ The Ministry of Water": "Tears, tears, tears." "Songs of the Chu‧ Nine Chapters-Sorrowful Return to the Wind": "The orphan sings and weeping, and releases the child without returning it."

" Tears " also refers to things that look like tears. Tang Wen Tingyun "Bodhisattva Man": "Painting Luo Jin Jade, incense and candles sell into tears."

" Tears " also refers to tears. Southern Dynasty Qi Kong Zhigui "Beishan Yiwen": "Lei Zhaizi’s sorrow, and Zhu Gong’s cry."

" Tears " also expresses a sharp appearance. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng "Fu of the Southern Capital"": "The long-term loss is far away, and the tears are lingering." Li Shan quoted "Huainanzi": "The tears break the boat."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " brute ", the original meaning is tears.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「戾」聲，本義為眼淚。《玉篇‧水部》：「淚，涕淚也。」《楚辭‧九章‧悲回風》：「孤子吟而抆淚兮，放子出而不還。」

　　「淚」也指形似眼淚的東西。唐溫庭筠〈菩薩蠻〉：「畫羅金翡翠，香燭銷成淚。」

　　「淚」還指流淚。南朝齊孔稚珪〈北山移文〉：「淚翟子之悲，慟朱公之哭。」

　　「淚」亦表示勁疾貌。《文選‧張衡〈南都賦〉》：「長輸遠逝，漻淚淢汩。」李善注引《淮南子》：「水淚破舟。」

從「 水 」，「 戾 」聲，本義為眼淚。《玉篇‧水部》：「淚，涕淚也。」《楚辭‧九章‧悲回風》：「孤子吟而抆淚兮，放子出而不還。」 「 淚 」也指形似眼淚的東西。唐溫庭筠〈菩薩蠻〉：「畫羅金翡翠，香燭銷成淚。」 「 淚 」還指流淚。南朝齊孔稚珪〈北山移文〉：「淚翟子之悲，慟朱公之哭。」 「 淚 」亦表示勁疾貌。《文選‧張衡〈南都賦〉》：「長輸遠逝，漻淚淢汩。」李善注引《淮南子》：「水淚破舟。」
From the sound of " water" and " bristle", the original meaning is tears. "The Jade Chapter‧ The Ministry of Water": "Tears, tears, tears." "Songs of the Chu‧ Nine Chapters-Sorrowful Return to the Wind": "The orphan sings and weeping, and releases the child without returning it." " Tears" also refers to things that look like tears. Tang Wen Tingyun "Bodhisattva Man": "Painting Luo Jin Jade, incense and candles sell into tears." " Tears" also refers to tears. Southern Dynasty Qi Kong Zhigui "Beishan Yiwen": "Lei Zhaizi’s sorrow, and Zhu Gong’s cry." " Tears" also expresses a sharp appearance. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng "Fu of the Southern Capital"": "The long-term loss is far away, and the tears are lingering." Li Shan quoted "Huainanzi": "The tears break the boat."

淚字的基本解释

淚
lèi
同“泪”。

淚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lèi］
［《廣韻》力遂切，去至，來。］
亦作“泪1”。
(1)眼泪；泪液。
(2)指形似眼泪的东西。
(3)流泪。
[②]［lì］
［《集韻》郎計切，去霽，來。］
(1)疾貌。
(2)见“淒淚”。

淚字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淚； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页630第02
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力遂切，音類。目液也。【本草】淚者，肝之液。【譚子化書珠玉篇】悲則雨淚。　又【集韻】劣戌切，音律。義同。　又【集韻】【韻會】郞計切【正韻】力霽切，?音麗。疾流貌。【張衡·南都賦】漻淚淢汨。【註】引淮南子，水淚破舟。○按《淮南子·主術訓》本作戾。淚與戾古通。　又【集韻】力結切，音捩。義同。　又淒淚，寒涼貌。【前漢·武帝賦】秋氣憯以淒淚。亦作戾。

淚字的源字形

淚字的起名意思

暂无。

[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　 Lei; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 630 No. 02
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Positive Rhyme]? Force and cut, phonetic class. Eye fluid also. 【Materia Medica】Lears, liver fluid. [Tan Zihua Book Pearl and Jade Chapter] Sadness brings rain and tears.　[Jiyun] Inferior, melody. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Yun Jiqie [Zheng Yun] Li Jiqie,? Yinli. Swift stream appearance. [Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu] 漻淢淢淨. [Note] Citing Huainanzi, tears broke the boat. ○According to "Huainanzi · Master Skill Training", this is a hostile. Tears and cruelty pass.　[Jiyun] force knot cut, sound smash. The same meaning.　 Tears again, cold appearance. 【Former Han·Wu Emperor Fu】The Qiu Qi is full of tears. Also as hostage.
